document_title: Fournier syndrome: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: hoi-chung-fournier.json_2_What are the symptoms of Fournier disease?
subsection_content:
When Fournier syndrome occurs, tissues break down, leading to some recognizable symptoms as follows:
Sudden pain in the genital area; The infection progresses rapidly, the skin turns purple-red or gray-blue; The skin area has an unpleasant odor; Swelling.; Pus leakage; Arrhythmic heartbeat.; High fever.; Testicles are exposed.
subsection_title: hoi chung fournier.json. What are the symptoms of Fournier disease?
subsection_data:
